terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro_html: These Terms (the "Terms") govern the use of {{site}} (the "Service"). Please read and agree before using.

def.seller: "Seller": a person who sells content (digital files) on the Service
def.buyer: "Buyer": a person who purchases content on the Service

terms.account_html: The Service uses external authentication such as Google. Users must keep their registration accurate and manage their accounts responsibly.
terms.warranty_html: Sellers represent and warrant that (1) they hold necessary rights, (2) do not infringe third-party rights, and (3) comply with laws and public order.
terms.license_html: The usage scope on each product page prevails. Unless otherwise noted, personal use only; redistribution, resale, public transmission, and secondary distribution of modifications are prohibited.

fees.intro_html: Payments are processed via Stripe or equivalent. A platform fee is deducted from sales.
fees.li_settlement: The fee is deducted at payment capture.
fees.li_payout: Payouts follow Stripe Connect rules and schedule.
fees.li_chargeback: Refunds/chargebacks/fraud may be offset against sales or adjusted later.
fees.li_change: The fee rate may change with prior notice on the Service.

terms.refund_html: Due to the nature of digital goods, purchases are non-refundable after completion. Double charges, wrong charges, or defective files are handled individually.

prohibited.law: Violations of laws or public order
prohibited.ip: Infringement of third-party rights (copyright, trademark, portrait, etc.)

terms.moderation_html: We may remove unlawful/inappropriate content and suspend accounts when necessary.
terms.disclaimer_html: We do not warrant completeness, accuracy, or usefulness of content. Our liability is limited to the amount paid to us in the month concerned, except for willful misconduct or gross negligence.
terms.ip_html: Rights in content belong to the respective right holders. Ownership does not transfer upon purchase.
terms.changes_html: We may modify these Terms. The revised Terms take effect upon posting.
terms.law_html: These Terms are governed by {{law}}. The exclusive agreed jurisdiction is {{court}}.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_html: This policy explains what information we collect, how we use and share it, and how we manage it.

google.item: Google ID (sub), display name, email address, profile image URL

service.item1: Account info (stored as a user of the service)
service.item3: Stripe identifiers (e.g., Connect ID). *We do not store card numbers.

usage.item1: To authenticate users and manage accounts
usage.item3: To prevent abuse and improve security/operations
usage.item4: To comply with laws and respond to inquiries

privacy.sharing_html: We share the minimum necessary data with Stripe for payment processing. We do not sell or rent data to third parties except as required by law.
privacy.security_html: We implement reasonable security measures such as access control and encryption, though perfect security cannot be guaranteed.
privacy.retention_html: We retain data only as long as necessary for legal or operational purposes, and delete it appropriately when no longer needed.
